DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is: - To validate the use of pedometers in assessing the level of physical activity in middle school children. - To evaluate whether setting a step goal through the use of pedometers could increase physical activity and prevent weight gain in middle school children.
DOC.brief_title: The Use of Pedometers as an Adjunctive Tool in a School-based Pediatric Weight Management Program
DOC.criteria: All healthy 8th grade students at the Springboard Academy of the Milton Hershey School willing to participate in the study and whose parents give consent. Any medical condition that prevents the child from walking during the 12 week study period. NonEnglish speaking student.
